Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleView, GUIView
    public interface View
    This class contains the view screens.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.util.Queue<java.lang.Runnable> connection
      This queue passes the selected connection to the Client class.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void boardScreen​(javax.json.JsonObject object)
      This is the board screen.
      void gameListScreen()
      This is the game list screen.
      void gameNotStartedScreen()
      This is the game not started screen.
      void initialScreen​(int discoveryPort, int rmiPort, int socketPort)
      The initial screen of the CLI.
      void loginScreen()
      This is the login screen, the user can choose an username and login to the server.
      javax.json.JsonObject userInput()
      This method waits for a user input and returns the parsed JsonObject.

        This queue passes the selected connection to the Client class.

      • initialScreen

        void initialScreen​(int discoveryPort,
                   int rmiPort,
                   int socketPort)
        The initial screen of the CLI. The user can choose between RMI connection and socket connection.

      • loginScreen

        This is the login screen, the user can choose an username and login to the server.
